description.zh-CN: 比较各环节业务数据，发现问题，进而做出决策。常用于短信/邮件/电商销售的活动监控，或者在复盘汇报中可视化展示。
description.en-US: Analyze the data for different sections within the procedure, reveal the issue and help making the well-informed decision. Often used in SMS/email/online retailing campaigns as well as data visualization in summary reports.
